named-native-query.name: ReserveDao.countAvailableRooms
named-native-query.query: select count(1) from tb_reserve where fk_rom = :roomId and to_Date <= :toDate and is_cancel = 0

named-native-query.name: ReserveDao.checkCancelRooms
named-native-query.query: select is_cancel isCancel from tb_reserve where id = :reserveId

named-native-query.name: ReserveDao.validateUniqueCode
named-native-query.query: select count(1) from tb_reserve where code = :code

named-native-query.name: ReserveDao.reservationList
named-native-query.query: select res.from_date, res.to_date, htl.name as hotel_name,res.reserve_date from tb_reserve res join tb_room rom on rom.id = res.fk_rom join tb_hotel htl on htl.id = rom.fk_htl join tb_user usr on usr.id = res.fk_usr where usr.id = :userId

named-native-query.name: ReserveDao.getUniqueCode
named-native-query.query: SELECT rand_val FROM ( SELECT CAST(NEWID() AS NVARCHAR(36)) AS rand_val ) AS subquery WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tb_reserve WHERE code = subquery.rand_val)
